price: (Wọ́n ṣe) ìyẹn nítorí pé, wọ́n gbàgbọ́, lẹ́yìn náà wọ́n ṣàì gbàgbọ́. Nítorí náà, A ti fi èdídí dí ọkàn wọn; wọn kò sì níí gbọ́ àgbọ́yé.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ ءَامَنُواْ ثُمَّ كَفَرُواْ فَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum āmanū thumma kafarū faṭubiʿa ʿalā qulūbihim fahum lā yafqahūna
